subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Alexa Glatch and Melanie Oudin lost in straight sets Saturday, giving Italy a 2-0 lead over the United States in the Fed Cup final in Reggio Calabria, Italy.
snippet: Alexa Glatch and Melanie Oudin lost in straight sets Saturday, giving Italy a 2-0 lead over the United States in the Fed Cup final in Reggio Calabria, Italy.
